explanation.rules:
present: no-

object = singular | plural
              nV- | lV-
              kV- | lenV-
V is the vowel from the following syllable

[blank] | ‘strike’ | ‘pierce’
present, subject = 1st |  ho- | fu-
otherwise | ha- | fi-

future, subject = {1st: lu-, 2nd: la-}

subject = dual: -'i

[blank] | indicative | ‘because…’
subject = 1st person pl or 2nd person sg | -ne | -tagihe
otherwise |-be | -nagighe
rule_checklist: object = singular | plural nV- | lV- kV- | lenV- V is the vowel from the following syllable
[blank] | 'strike' | 'pierce' present, subject = 1st | ho- | fu- otherwise | ha- | fi-
[blank] | indicative | 'because...' subject = 1st person pl or 2nd person sg | -ne | -tagihe otherwise |-be | -nagighe
